code: import*as yup from'yup';var SignUpSchema=yup.object().shape({name:yup.string().required("Name is required").min(3,"Name must be at least 3 characters long"),lastName:yup.string().required("Last name is required").min(3," Last name must be at least 3 characters long"),email:yup.string().email().required("Email is required"),password:yup.string().required("Password is required").min(5,"Password must be at least 5 characters long"),term:yup.boolean().oneOf([true],"please agree with our terms")});export default SignUpSchema;
